website_summaries.verdict: A nice size if you need a model that's small enough for your counter top. Average in price, quality, and features.
pros: Streamlined machine that's fast and easy to use
Reusable bags cut down on cost and waste
cons: Instructions are unclear and the sealer isn't as easy to use as some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one to replace another brand that broke. I attempted to package 15 packages tonight. The first seal failed on about half of them and I could not complete the vacuum pack. On close examination, there appears to be a bubble/imperfection in the seal. Also, the product is not stable and tends to tip when you raise the lid. I cannot recommend this one and will search for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in June of 2017 and used maybe 10 to 15 times. It worked good in the beginning but then one day.....it decided to not work. The only thing I was using it for is my homemade beef jerkey. I originally thought it was the bags maybe....but it wasn't. The machine just doesn't suck suck suck like it did in the beginning LOL... anyway. You get what you pay for I guess. I'm on the market for a high quality one now!
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: I'm so pleased with this food vacuum sealer
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this food vacuum sealer. Our other food sealer broke but I hated that thing (obviously different brand). It was bulky, loud, and difficult to use.This nutrichef pkvs18 is slim, sleek, and easy to use. No more multiple times just trying to get a bag to seal. It worked flawlessly and I really put it through it's paces right out of the box with having to package about 60lbs of meat. Thank you for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this first
customer_reviews.text: **Update - this still works just as well as the day I bought it now in November 2018. I frequently use it to package fresh meat that I buy when it goes on sale. I've never, ever had a bag lose its seal - not even one! 100% satisfied** I bought this to replace a cheap Aldi brand sealer that quit working after about 10 uses. What a difference! Excellent suction without being too loud or difficult to use. Worked the first time right out of the box, and haven't had a problem yet. I will update after more uses and after I've tried a wider variety of items .
customer_reviews.author: Kerriann

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would not seal bags. Vacuum pump runs but the sealer doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is everything the manufacturer claims it to be.. Easy to use, less set up time than my old unit from the same company, smaller foot print, takes up less counter space.
customer_reviews.author: William Haug

customer_reviews.title: reasonably priced vacuum sealer
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking to buy a vacuum sealer for quite some time as I use my sous vide circulator a lot, and I want to minimize my use of ziploc bags. It took a few minutes of testing to figure out how this vacuum sealer worked, but once I got the hang of it, it quickly vacuumed and sealed bags for storage. I have yet to try this on vacuum bags containing liquid marinade.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Really great product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift for Christmas as I always wanted one. I used it without using the instructions and it worked on the first try! Easy to use, fits nicely on my countertop and I plan to use this all the time!!!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Love it very affordable will recommend this to friends and family
customer_reviews.text: My wife has wanted to get a vacuum sealer at Costco and they are expensive. This is a great starter kit to try this out and very affordable as well.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It took just a little learning curve; however, worked well once we figured it out.
customer_reviews.text: It worked as expected. I packed marinated meat and green beans with some juice in them. Both sealed well. It has only been a few days, therefore, I am not sure how long the sealed bags will last.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Speyrer

customer_reviews.title: Initially I didn't like the machine because it left a lot of air ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially I didn't like the machine because it left a lot of air in the first few seals. After reviewing, and locating a video on YouTube, I noticed I was putting the bag too far in the machine and therefore covering the vacuum hole. After figuring this out, life became MUCH easier. I haven't had a chance to use the vacuum hose but currently, it is doing the job I purchased it for...sealing and preserving my food! Since I am now an avid air fryer user, this is a MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: Carlette C.

customer_reviews.title: We do not like this product
customer_reviews.text: We just received it and tried to seal cured meat thin slices and it sealed once out of 10 attempts. We do not like this product. We want to return it for a full refund. The one attempt that it did seal was only about 95% and was still slightly loose.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Connors

customer_reviews.title: it is very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because of the size. This machine is very small and light weight but it seals as good if not better than the large one I replaced . the bag cutter was a trip to figure out but when I did it was a laugh that I took so long. The cutter is on the top and you simply place the bag material over it to size then slide the cutter. The whole machine is simple and I love it
customer_reviews.author: myrazydzik

customer_reviews.title: **CHEAP Product** Doesn't work...
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend this sealer. I used it twice to vacuum seal small bags of snacks. It sealed; but the vacuum seeped out within minutes. I used it today and it doesn't heat up or seal anything. Piece of cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer999

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, not great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this on dry (candies & chips) and moist (cooked meats) food, and on small versus large quantities. Pros: 1) inbuilt bag cutter 2) easy to setup and use 3) great price Cons: 1) all air was not removed, especially with the moist foods. I am not sure if this is an issue with the bags or the item itself. I returned it and invested in a FoodSaver which better met my vacuuming expectations. Its worth it in my mind, when I spend hundred on bulk meat, to have the best vacuum sealer. this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: LAJ473

customer_reviews.title: Quality...5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a Christmas gift for my brother-in-law! He is an AMAZING cook & loves all the newest kitchen gadgets. He actually wanted a different one but this is the one I chose instead. My initial reasoning was just on the looks alone but he has done nothing but rave about it and how well it works. He is a happy which makes me happy!! 5 Stars all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leeser

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Rarely if ever works. Don't waste your money. 9 times out of 10 it will just keep vacuuming forever, forcing me to cancel, adjust the bag pointlessly, and ultimately cut a new bag hoping that one works. I just checked three recently "successful" vacuum sealed bags and they all have air in them. I might as well have just used a ziplock bag. I've never used a vacuum sealer before this one but I have to assume they are supposed to work better than this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: WORST WARRANTY-BE WARE DO NOT BUY BEFORE READING THIS
customer_reviews.text: ZERO stars for this PYLE product’s warranty. If your unit is past 30 days of purchase and it breakes... then bot only do you have to pay for shipping to send them the unit but to receive it back. BE WARE OF WARRANTY before you purchase this unit. THIS IS A PYLE PRODUCT AND THEIR LIMITED WARRANTY IS GARBAGE. They only want more money and don’t really care about their customers. Buy from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Sovi

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good product
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this machine does not perform well, it has a slick look but that's where the "pros" end. The "cons" begins with the vacuum action does not fully pull the air out of the bags and it continues the sealing process whether you've gotten the air out or not, the vacuum area is too far into the machine prompting wasted extra length of bag and difficulty aligning for a seal, the soft material for the machine seal where it enters the body of the machine is impossible to clean completely. Amazon has allowed return, however pay close attention to the limited return date.
customer_reviews.author: Springer Rider

customer_reviews.title: Electric Air Sealing Preserver System
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to help preserve food longer to save money in the big picture. This Automatic Food Vacuum Sealer has been a good choice and I'm satisfied with my selection. Like how it's smaller and sets nice on my countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to replace an old Food Saver Vacuum Sealer that finally gave up the ghost. The price was considerably less than a new Food Saver, and it was smaller, which was a plus. The NutriChef sealer I received seemed quite flimsy, and after sealing several packages of meat, the suction function quit. I called customer service and was told that yes, they would honor the warranty, but there would be a hefty fee to return the item. Thankfully, I had ordered through Amazon, so I just returned it through them and ordered another Food Saver. The fates seemed to be smiling on me, as the price of that new sealer had been reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Does exactly what it needs to do!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid cook and baker, and with 2 small kids, I make a LOT of small sized foods, in bulk. My freezer would be packed FULL of Ziplocs. Not anymore. This thing has saved my food AND my space! It's so easy to use, and I love that's it's so simple. You can cut bags to size, use it with marinades, wet food, and seal in canisters. It's not horribly loud either. I just vacuum sealed 2 freezers in 3 hours. I should have bought one of these a long time ago! Do yourself a favor and buy this! You don't need the bells and whistles of the other competition! This gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Saroch

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK for 10-15 uses then it started to fall apart. See photo. It costs me $15.00 restock fee to Amazon. The company claims that they are not the manufactior but the assembler of the product. They wanted me to pay shipping both ways. I don't want this product any more as I don't need another one that will just fall apart. Inexpensive but Not a good buy. I've had very few if any products that needed to be returned to Amazon but this is not good customer service and not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and no issues so far. Used it to bag deer jerky and it performed well.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE BARLOW

customer_reviews.title: It is very picky on the bags.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I have a defective unit... I have purchased 4 different brands of bags and I cannot get the thing to do a tight vacuum seal. It is really frustrating that I have spent more on bags I can't use than what I actually paid for this unit. I have had it for two months and am absolutely frustrated. No where does it say what bags you can and cannot use... it doesnt seem to like the bags that are smooth on one side but that is all you can find anywhere online. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Emil Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I ordered this and it worked the 1st 6 seals, then it just stopped... all the sounds and buttons worked fine. I thought the bags were defective so I bought new ones, it still didn’t work but I was past my return policy. I bought another one and the SAME thing happened. I wanted to like this.... but it failed miserably..
customer_reviews.author: Giang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This is a sealed deal !
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few other brands in my time and quite honestly was never very impressed for one reason or another. Now I just received this today, so I cannot make any claims of prolonged use . However I can tell you that immediately I liked this thing. It was confirmed when i used it that this product is well built and seems powerful and is also more in the range of a compact size I had always planned to purchase but instead would end up with a huge counter top style. . So off to a good start but time will tell. Its got my vote already . Have a great day !
customer_reviews.author: EErock

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to use, everything you need in the box
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I just got into cooking sous vide and figured I would purchase a vacuum sealer since so many vegetable recipes ask to vacuum seal. I used the NutriChef vacuum sealer for the first time today for cauliflower and broccoli and it worked fantastically. At this price point ($60), nothing beats the NutriChef in terms of reviews and features. It's great that it comes with a starter kit of cut bags and a plastic roll! Everything you need to start vacuum sealing is right in the box. If you're looking for a basic, compact vacuum sealer, I would highly recommend the NutriChef!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kwong

customer_reviews.title: Food sealer that won't seal food
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for dry things. If you try anything with any liquid at all (such as pulled pork with some juice in it), it completely fails to seal the bag. It'll leave one or two spots unsealed, which kind of ruins the whole point. It's possible I just got a bad one, I suppose. I'm returning it and ordering a different brand. Also, minor complaint, the little tray that catches liquid can't come out of the thing so it's hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: The Dave

customer_reviews.title: It's nice enough but....
customer_reviews.text: I got this product on September 10, 2018. I make muffins probably once every few months. The sealer worked fine the first two times. Now six months later I'm trying to seal muffins and out of 8 I only accomplished getting four sealed. I have wasted plastic bags sitting on my counter as I type this. I've written the company to see about an exchange or replacement even though the return window has closed, but there has to be some sort of warranty on the product. I definitely would NOT recommend buying this product if the customer service isn't any good. I guess I'll see in due time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Little

customer_reviews.title: CRAP!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. I am using this sealer for the first time after Christmas, per the instructions, and this thing is CRAP. It barely seals. In fact, had several bags come open. Forget about vaccumm sealing!! It will run for a long time but doesn't pull any of the air out and doesn't seal. It's also super noisy. Don't buy!! Unfortunately, it's past the deadline to send it back. This will be going to Goodwill or dumpster
customer_reviews.author: TX Fireman

customer_reviews.title: Broken and can’t reach the warranty department
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and haven’t used it much throughout the time I’ve had it. Well almost a year after purchase it stopped sealing. The heating element stopped working. I have tried to contact the warranty department but they never responded to me. I will be buying a new one of a different brand. This is one of those things where you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Anthony Newland

customer_reviews.title: Having too much Fun
customer_reviews.text: After I learnt how to use the sealer. I now, love it..... I wanna seal everything...LOL This is my first Food Sealer and I really like it. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodes L.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and defective
customer_reviews.text: To say I am disappointed would be an understatement. I have had this machine less then 24 hours and it does not work. The vacuum will not vacuum. No matter what I do or try it will not vacuum the air out of a bag, Starts the vacuum process and after a few seconds it will seal. I even put a spoon in a bag to test it and still would not vacuum it just makes some noise and goes right to sealing the bag. I am going to pack it back up and sending it back because it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie W.

customer_reviews.title: It didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, but only for three months. Now it doesn't vacuum the air anymore. We only used it about four times before it stopped working. Very disappointing. I tried all the trouble-shooting tips, but nothing works. It runs and seals the bag still full of air. I tried it with multiple bags and still no luck. Update: I called the manufacturer and it seemed like a tiny operation in Brooklyn. Since it's older than two months, they want me to pay shipping for repairs. So the price for this appliance just went up 15%. Details to follow.
customer_reviews.author: M. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seal much of anything well
customer_reviews.text: Sealer? When? I've tried to seal bags with this machine dozens of times, and it won't work properly about 90% of the time. I bought this to use with my Sous Vide and it's pretty much been in the way the whole time. My bags start to close, then air sneaks in at the last second, so I almost never get a good airtight seal. The green/black machine makes this look like a toy, and if I could return it I would. I've been so upset at it that I let it sit around too long. I'll have a good time bringing it to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: rpamz

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended - pure crap.
customer_reviews.text: The sealing doesn't work very well. Almost every time I have to take the food out, cut off an inch or so, and reseal. And, most everything I've seal and froze shows signs of ice crystals. Plus it feels like it's mostly made of plastic. I would return it if I could. I'm lowering my rating to as low as possible. What an f'ing POS this thing is...pure solid plastic junk. It's in my recycling bin now and off to a better tomorrow as, possibly, another crappy foreign made kitchen gadget. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: James Betts

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Vacuum Sealer - Just don't do it...
customer_reviews.text: I was relatively happy with this - at first. Then, maybe 2 months after its first use, one of the LED indicator lights went out. Minor annoyance. Not worth time and effort to return it under warranty. Then another. Last month (about 15 months after purchase) the heating tape developed a "bubble" and that caused a gap in the seal. Then about a week later it just quit. They should mention in the description that you're actually buying a disposable appliance. Junk. I now have an Avid Armor ( and love it. A lot more expensive, but truly Pro grade.
customer_reviews.author: BE Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: NEED TO KNOW INFORMATION BELOW
customer_reviews.text: MAKE SURE TEXTURED SIDE OF BAGS ARE FACING DOWN WHEN VACUUM SEALING!!! If it isn't, your bags will not seal or vacuum correctly if even at all! Also when using this, if you have liquids inside your bag, do NOT use the moist setting. It doesn't do shit. Instead, clamp your bag in, hold it over the edge of a counter or table, start your vacuum seal on normal and pull the bag under the ledge while holding your sealer on the top. Basically cut off the liquids from reaching the inside of your vacuum sealer!! Besides that it works just fine especially for freezing foods (BUY THE 2 PACK OF 100ft BAGS AND YOULL SAVE A LOT OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I have used vacuum sealers for years and though they are nice they do wear out. This one is pure garbage. From the very beginning it did one sealing and cannot seal another package after that. The suction is minimal and it took three times before I could get a seal on the first and last package I tried. After that it indicated it was sealing but nothing happened or at most a small portion of the bag sealed. Strongly recommend AGAINST ANYONE BUYING THIS PIECE OF CRAP.
customer_reviews.author: chpetersen

customer_reviews.title: LIKE A THIEF IN THE NIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Like a thief in the night... I had carefully packed my vacuum Bags full of the freshest fish you’d ever seen. Mahi Mahi, tuna, striper, salmon, swordfish.... and then I perfectly lined up the bag with the vacuum changer. Slammed the lid down until it locked, looked at the glowing vac/seal button, pressed it and stepped back. LIKE A THIEF IN THE NIGHT, the nutrichef swiftly removed all of the air from within the bag, leaving the beautiful fish wrapped in an impenetrable plastic case. God has spoken and the bald eagles have soared. It gets no better than this.
customer_reviews.author: roussin0311

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly stopped working but manfacturer sent a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: I was contacted by the manufacturer to discuss the issue. After a little bit of delay (due to extraordinary circumstances of covid-19) they sent me a replacement. The replacement works well and I'm happy with the outcome. I applaud them for standing by their product. ------------------------------------ Pass review: I had this vacuum sealer for a little under a year. Used it about 3 times per month. Was quite happy with the unit. It suddenly stopped working. Lights no longer turn on when plugged in. I am not sure how it can suddenly top working in less than a year. Would like to get a replacement but NutriChef not responding to email. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Just not enough
customer_reviews.text: Got this without wanting to spend $$$ and having an expectation to match. It was consistently inconsistent in being able to transition from suction to sealing and after a few months it was more miss than hit. We seal 10lbs of burger and chicken breast about every other month. So, not going hardcore. However, doing 20lbs in one sealing session just seemed to be more than this was intended. Would be good for here and there applications, can't recommend if you would be using it regularly, even with less that what we were doing.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I love my Nutri Chef vacuum sealer so much. It's incredibly easy to use and the vacuum work wonderfully. You can adjust how strongly it vacuums and you can seal other types of bags too (not vacuum). Yesterday, I gathered all of the opened snacks around the house, cut them shorter and seal every single one. No more paper clips, rubber bands,... Also, the surface of the sealer is so so beautiful. Buy this product, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tammy West

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: Heating element gets so hot, and takes so long to cool down, you absolutely can't use this for large quantities of food. You'll need to wait a few minutes between each seal. And the suction is unreliable at best. When you get it to work, it keeps food quite nicely, but getting it to not prematurely seal bags, or outright melt the plastic? Best of luck. It looks nice, appears well constructed, but we'd recommend getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price point. Good seal good vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for one 2 weeks so far but I am thoroughly impressed with the product at this price point. I don't think the wet mode vacuums at all but with careful observation you can accomplish sealing "wet" stuff by manually switching to seal at the right time. Product looks very slick and is fairly compact for an nyc apartment. Only negative thing is the bag tends to have a long area at the top that is unusable because of the length that needs to be inserted into the vacuum chamber. I recommend that you lay the bag and contents on a thick cutting board so that the bag is at an even height with the vacuum sealer.
customer_reviews.author: speedkillz118

customer_reviews.title: NOT AGENCY APPROVED, SAFETY HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not US agency approved. I don't believe it is CE approved either, as there is no agency stamp on the unit. Vacuum sealers are required an interlock system to activate the heater bar and vacuum and this unit does not have this. Heater bar can be accidentally turned on while unit is open causing serious safety hazard. Spend the extra $10 and buy a FoodSaver for safety and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: Straight garbage
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing is garbage! Close to impossible to get my bags vacuum sealed, and then the seal doesn’t even hold up in the water for sous vide cooking, so I’m basically just boiling my food directly in the water. Returning this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great If Used Correctly
customer_reviews.text: Works well once I corrected my operator error. The first time I used it I placed the bag in the wrong location and there was no vacuum action. The instructions could be better, because all it says is to place the bag as shown in the picture, but there is not enough detail in the picture to discern precisely where to place the bag. After my first failure, I examined the machine and saw that there is a trough surrounded by a rubber seal, which is where the opening of the bag needs to be for the vacuum to work. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Greywolf

customer_reviews.title: Must click before able to vacuum seal
customer_reviews.text: I was about to return this - I packed it up and everything but then my spouse figured it out. IT MUST CLICK IN TO VACUUM SEAL. Other brands you just hold down and that was definitely not working in this case. I assumed it would lock into place after it was done since instructions said to press the buttons but before you vacuum seal, IT MUST CLICK INTO PLACE - YOU DONT PRESS & HOLD TO SEAL. I hope this helps y’all. I’ll update my review if the seal on my cheese gets loose.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST AND MOST AFFORDABLE INVESTMENT WE'VE MADE IN YEARS!!!  WHAT A MONEY SAVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We received our Nutrichef Food Vacuum Sealer today and it's already paid for itself! I've been wanting to get one for several months, so I read a lot of reviews for different brands, sizes, options...I watched lots of videos to see which ones were easiest to use, and mostly, I looked for affordability. And I found it!!! Tonight, I sealed up enough meat and chicken for 6 meals (it's only myself and my husband, but it pays to buy family size packages). I watched a 'how to' video before I used it and was pleasantly surprised at how easy and fun it was!! It only took about fifteen minutes to bag and seal those six meals. Definitely FIVE STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Salamone

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The use of the machine is very easy to use. Life is so much simpler when you are storing foods for freezer, or using a sous vide for a dinner. By far the best vacuum sealer I've gotten myself. Worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dad Joke about this unit Sucking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we had been buying food in bulk. We’ve recently started dehydrating as well too — so preserving jerky, fruits and everything in between is why we bought this. As far as performance this produce seals and bags without issue. I used some 3-sided sealed bags from another manufacturer and this pulled and sealed very easily One of the only things that I noticed was that it takes a little but of manpower to push and engaged with the side locks. I don’t think that’s a flaw but perhaps the models that are three times more expensive lock a bit easier? I saw no issues and think this product for what it does is an incredible value.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schur

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could be more detailed for beginner users. Over all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: joel Rojas

customer_reviews.title: An Affordable Must for Every Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, whisper quiet, affordable, and looks nice. This little sealer works great. I sealed individual tbs size servings of things like canned adobo peppers, pumpkin, and tomato paste as I usually only need tablespoons at a time. I cut the bags to size, sealed sides, filled, and froze and was able to use nearly every inch of the bags, wasting nothing. Would definitely purchase this model again. See link:
customer_reviews.author: recyclist

customer_reviews.title: Having trouble creating a vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have to look for another vacuum sealer. This unit is very temperamental on how you place the bag in the machine. The unit will not create enough vacuum just by closing and locking the lid. I always have to press down on the corners and middle to get the machine to create a vacuum. At the time of this review I had the machine about 7 months and have used it around 11 times. I am using brand name vacuum bags instead of the generic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoshi

customer_reviews.title: There are some tricky moments
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it works really well. However, there are moments when the seal doesn't complete which makes it impossible to make the package airtight. As in when you use the roll rather than pre-made bags...so you seal one end, fill your bag with meat and hit vacseal and it doesn't vac airtight and the seal begins so you have to redo. Still to me good value.
customer_reviews.author: Zmill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but bad design in heating element
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade from a previous sealer; I gave my Mom the old one and got this new one. Very happy with it so far. ***Update 9/11/2018*** the heating element had a defect that created a hole in the bags as another reviewer pointed out. Amazon refunded the original and I bought another one. I hope it does not have the same issue. I really do love it. ***Update 2 - heating element has the same issue. This is a design flaw. Unfortunately, I’ll have to return it. Downgraded to 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good machine,  worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd NutriChef vacuum sealer which says a lot about my preferenceto it.. I broke the 1st one which I had for 3 months. I put too much liquid in the bag (it specifically tells you not too). It ended up over filling and It blew a circuit. I gauge it as a user error, not machine. Anyway, I loved my sealer and it had been doing a good job thus far. I like to buy in bulk and split up our meals, and I noticed a significant difference in the freshness of the food. I packaged quite a few products from meats, to fish, and cheeses and have not had any trouble. It's worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Dee_lite

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My mother has an older model food saver. I really like being able to freeze foods conveniently but her unit made so much noise, was very heavy and awkward to use. My husband and I researched vacuum food saving units and found this one to suit our needs. The first day I got it (Aug 8) I used up the entire sample roll that came with it. By reading the reviews, we learned to make sure the unit clicks on both sides before starting to use it. It works quickly and is quite effective. It is lightweight and easy to store. I love this little unit!
customer_reviews.author: Curly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good as a starter, but plan on buying a better one eventually
customer_reviews.text: It worked well the first handful of vacuum seals, but the suction seemed to loose power the more it is used. Also, the rubber seal tends to get weak and become loose after using. I would not buy this again, and do not actually recommend this to anyone half-way serious about needing to vacuum seal. It does NOT vacuum seal mylar bags. I know it is not advertised as such, and my rating is not influenced by this fact, but am stating this in case anyone is looking for a vacuum sealer for mylar bags.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it more
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've owned this for over a year, I can say that ultimately I found it disappointing and just had to upgrade for a FoodSaver brand. I'm usually all for lesser known brands that do a good job, but this just doesn't seem to want to do its job. I'll take frozen meat out of the freezer and find that it had slowly let air in and that defeats the whole purpose. At first I was convinced it was the bags I was using, but it's obvious now that it's just the vaccum sealer itself that is the problem. Hopefully I have better luck with the name brand as I sure will be paying for it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Giggy

customer_reviews.title: Short term usefulness
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in November 2018. I am not sure how this happened, but when I tried to use it today, the part that is supposed to provide the suction had come loose rendering this thing useless. It was okay while it worked, however, it was inconsistent in providing the vacuum seal desired.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michelle Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a month or so....then useless POS
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible product! The heat seal works just fine so it's easy to put a bag in and seal the first end. However when it's time to vacuum seal the bag, the sealer is absolutely positively USELESS. Sometimes (maybe 10% of the time) the product will work without problem. The other 90% of the time it will literally take 8-10 times for the stupid thing to (a) suck out all the air and (b) realize the air sucked out and actually seal it. It is now in the bottom of my trash can and it's probably the happiest I've ever been with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shankman

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok for me
customer_reviews.text: Almost returned this but looked for a better one first. Unless you want to spend a LOT more money, looks like this is as good as it gets. It does suck the air out, and seal..... but a large percent of my seals don't STAY sealed. I look back later to find the bag full of air. I compared this one to several different brands, and seems they all have the same power and features. Would love a better one, but definitely don't want to spend hundreds of dollars on one. So... I guess this is just as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: KathyP

customer_reviews.title: Practical addition for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to kitchen hoggers (I meant those who really enjoy doing things in the kitchen!). Small families will greatly benefit having this as you can do bulk item purchases that can save Mom and Dad lots of time as well as money. You can divide big item buys into 3 meals, freeze it and use for other day's dinner or lunch or even breakfast. I label mine with dates and description of what is packed. Also so convenient when you are sending care packages to anyone. Pack it, vacuum, seal, freeze and send. It is a very easy to use item but takes a little time to get used to how it vacuum packs stuff.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Love this Vacuum sealer! It saves me a lot of money and wasting food. And it’s a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much use this product daily! I’m able to buy fabric packs of meat break them up into smaller portions freeze them without freezer burn! And even when I just sealed them and put it in the refrigerator that last at least three times as long!
customer_reviews.author: M J R

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flakey. Bought this in March 2018, used a dozen times and now November 2018, it barely works! Since day 1 it was touchy but now it's down right flakey! I should have bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: And boy am I glad we did so
customer_reviews.text: Have used FoodSaver's for years, with having to purchase a new one every 2 years or so. This time around I decided to use the power of amazon and customer reviews. And boy am I glad we did so. Very simple to use and it works EVERY TIME. No fiddling around with making sure the bag is "Just right" to appeal to the sealer gods. I am very impressed with how well this machine works. The true test will be the test of time, but we've owned it for a few months now and it's performed flawless each time. If you're sick of your foodsaver bombing out all the time, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Top quality craftmanship!
customer_reviews.text: I can marinade meat in a half hour. Works great, and my food lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.author: stephen b.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Unit and Service you could find!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the NutriChef Automatic Vacuum Air Sealing System. I was so happy to save money with all the food I buy. After Sealing 25 pounds of Food, my Unit did not Seal automatically. I cleaned the sealing area and the foam seal very good hoping this would help. It did not. I contacted NutriChef via Email asking what I could do in fixing this at home? I received an email the very next day. They were very understanding and wanted to solve my problem by sending out a NEW unit ASAP. WOW, that is what I call the BEST Service I could ever get! NOW I am a Happy Sealer again! Thanks, NutriChef! Dave Smith Michigan
customer_reviews.author: David A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this appliance 4/19/2019 and used it twice before today. I followed the directions, and it worked well. I’ve kept the machine in a safe, dry place, with its rolls of unsealed plastic. When I went to use it today, it would seal only. When the other end was placed, as directed, into the machine it sealed the end of the bag. OK, good! When, however, the other end was placed, as per the instructions in the machine, it would NOT vacuum seal. The bottom line....this appliance is a waste of money! Buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn't last 3 months.  Only the first month.
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first time we used it. We used it right away to check things out. We than used it 2 months later and had some trouble getting it to vacuum. It sealed everything but it wasn't vacuuming anything. So that wasn't helpful. Tried it again today with a new bag (yes....a bag bought from Amazon specifically made for this machine. Same thing. Isn't vacuuming anything. Just sealing it. To pay over $50.00 for this and it literally worked the first month and that was it. Its easy to use, but somehow mine only worked the first time. Extremely disappointed. I cannot find info about how to contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jane P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased during the early days of COVID when everyone was over buying meat and I wanted a way to keep it fresh. This takes some practice and a couple of U-Tube videos and I do recommend the videos. When closing it with a bag in it you need to lean on it and listen for the click. You will waste bags in the beginning and the size you get is very small. You will want larger ones for more that one maybe two chicken breast. Once you do get the hang of it it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work well at all. It is difficult to latch. You have to use excessive pressure on one side. Sometimes it vacuums; sometimes it doesn’t. My husband and I have both tried and can’t figure out why. The manual is very little help. For instance, It tells you to clean the vacuum well as the picture below shows. There is no picture, and we can’t see how to get to the place where the liquid that gets vacuumed out goes. I would definitely return it if it weren’t such a pain. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Holley

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have hoped...!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about 45 days and have run it through the ringer. After a false start of not getting the lid to click shut (wasn’t pressing hard enough) this has worked nearly perfectly each time. I have sealed everything from cheese and charcuterie to cooked gyoza, raw portioned filling for phyllo, to anything you can make for sous vide purposes, including 12 pounds of tenderloin (3 total) as seen in the video. No issues. No problems no bribes from seller. I will tell you this. When I had issues with it clicking shut they continually reached out to see if they could help even though I hadn’t responded after getting it to work. That’s customer service. .
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Love it but you have to learn how to use it
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine!! Had a lot of trouble getting started and was just about to return it when I found a youtube video saying you really have to press HARD to get it to close the first few times of use. I opened the package again and gave it another try. Had to put all my 155 pounds on top of it to close but it did and since then it has worked its magic on me. I have sous vide and vacuum sealed many groceries, left over cheeses, etc. I love it. The 4 stars are for making me have to figure out what was wrong in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Tekpro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had two vacuum sealers and was in need of a 3rd for another location. The size is perfect for the function. Smaller than my more expensive "automatic" one. Suction seems better than the auto one. Faster too. If like me, you use sealer a few times a week, the Nutrichef is perfect. If you vacuum seal several times a day, then the three times more expensive auto one may be for you. It also has a small attachment for sealing sealable wine corks as well as sealable plastic containers of various sizes. Happy sealing, you will love this machine and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee King

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get lid to close
customer_reviews.text: This was an Amazon top pick don't know how? The top lid doe's not snap close easily you have to apply a lot of pressure to the corners to get it to close completely. Being an engineering-type it looks like the gaskets that seal the vacuum chamber are quite stiff making the lid hard to close. A softer gasket and a stiffer lid would make it easier to use I am hoping the gaskets will wear in after a few uses. After getting the lid to close it does evacuate the bag and seal adequately.
customer_reviews.author: Wanel

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with high hopes based on all the positive ratings. However, the unit is not sealing properly. It constantly turns off before the sealing process is complete. I am very familiar with the use of vacuum sealers so I am confident this is not "user error." Unfortunately, the customer service department wants me to pay to have the unit shipped to them which I am not going to do. Not only is this inconvenient, it is not acceptable. My loss but I will never purchase a PYLE product again!!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so that I could vacuum and freeze vegetables that come out of my garden this summer. I just received it this week and wanted to give it a test run. I was pleasantly suprised at how easy it was to use. The only thing that I can think of to mention is that when you lock down the lid you really need to push. My first few times I pushed nothing happened. The audible click I was waiting to hear wasn't very loud. I was a little hesitant to push so hard because it was plastic, but if you push with the ball of yours hand on the corners it clicks in pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good-love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my machine. Now I can finally freeze meat, butter, cheese, & other things for longer term frozen storage without them getting freezer burnt & and having an off taste. I've also been vacuum sealing other dry goods such as tea bags for long term storage. I bought my machine pretty recently and only began using it this week {end of September 2020} I hope it will continue to last and perform well for years to come because I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: SMART SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: A little finicky but otherwise not too bad
customer_reviews.text: It is good, does its job, overall a good product. My biggest concern is having to lock it down to seal. To lock it down you have to push pretty hard on both sides. It always makes me nervous I am going to break it. Otherwise, the vacuum sealing is a bit of a hit-and-miss with me so far, and I am not sure what I am doing wrong here. Sometimes I can get a really solid seal without any air, and other times not. I cannot wrap my head around what I am doing wrong here either so it's a bit frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get both sides to lock down for the vacuum to work correctly. Then it would seal the bag before it was totally vacuumed of all air. That ruined several bags. I sent a message to support, all I got was they wanted proof of purchase. I sent that and never received any help. Had a friend come help me and she said this was crazy. She has a FoodSaver brand. Never had this trouble. I believe the unit I received was defective. Sent it back to Amazon for a full refund. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: j hyer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as demonstrated on YouTube.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought from a gift card for my Birthday. I've only used it 3 times as I buy meat in bulk and stock my 4 shelf standing freezer. At no time did the vac/seal botton work. I thought I had to stop it and use the seal when it wouldnt seal. I watched many videos on Saturday on YouTube and see that theirs vac and seal but mine just keep running. Pressing the seal button makes some liquid re-enter the bags. The seal button works but my meat and whatever I freeze has ice building up in the bags. Did I get a defective unit?
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: My initial review was 3 stars. After a few months, I have been able to get this to work maybe once in 20 times. Do not buy this product. I bought this thinking it would be a time and food saver. It takes an alignment of the stars and the moon in Cancer to get this to work, and I waste a lot of time repositioning bags. I have a roll of bags, that you have to seal at one end first, and I have not gotten it to work with one of those yet. It’s too hit or miss to make it convenient.
customer_reviews.author: I. Brossard

customer_reviews.title: More like a childs toy
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to close both side of the unit. You have to stand to close and engage lock on each side. Power is poor, there is not a reservoir for fluids to pool on moist items. Goes every where including in the machine. I now will not switch to seal on the vacuum/seal setting. Just not strong enough for doing monthly ground dog food. Even using for breaking down family packs, there is a lot of moving around the bag to find the right spot to vacuum the air out properly. Really, Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dmorgan817

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little unit.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. Read the instructions carefully and it will will perform as expected every time. I like the fact that it is very simple without a lot of options for the sake of options. It is very easy to operate, pretty fast, and does a great job. It is also very easy to keep clean and store out of the way when not needed. The only thing I would note is the touch buttons are pretty sensitive, so if you aren't careful you can accidentally touch the wrong one. Once I realized that I have not had any accidents. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cook

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective and company avoided talking to me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item due to it's good review. Asked my sister to bring it to me here in the Philippines. Lo and behold, sealing works but vacuum sealing doesn't. Inquired to their customer service about my product and explained the issue. At first, company was welcome to give us a replacement unit after showing them the item really is defective. But when told them that I am from a different country and it will take a while for me to ask somebody to bring it back to the US, that's were things went sour. No email replies after that. I followed up with another email but ignored. Bad company service.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I don't vacuum seal often, I didn't need any optional features, and I didn't want to spend a lot of money. This sealer is perfect for what I wanted. Auto start and bag storage features are quite noticeably absent, and if I need to replace this I might spring for a slightly fancier model. But if I have a few extra steaks I want to freeze, this is absolutely perfect for that. I bought 200 generic quart bags and they hold almost anything I could want.
customer_reviews.author: xThuglash

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this vacuum sealer, but it turned out to just be a disappointment. It vaccums the air out fine, but doesn't seal properly. The lid does not close easily, so the whole time it is vacuuming and sealing, i have to press it down firmly. I tried sealing it twice on the ends, still had air get into the package somehow. This thing is just a huge pain. I definitely do not recommend this machine. Spend a couple extra dollars and get something that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Replacement working just fine..
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a full month and a half, then the vaccum part stopped working, it will only seal now. This is why I do not rush into writing reviews although that's why I got this in the first place because of all the positive ones. Well, sometimes with products you just get a lemon and of course I can not return this now. I did send NutriChelf an email which they haven't respond to as of yet. Ok, well I just got an email offering a replacement or refund. I opt for the replacement and will update my review at a later time.. Got the replacement and this one is working like a gem... no problems to report...
customer_reviews.author: Macy West

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was so excited to get my vacuum sealer. I was looking forward to getting a great amount of use out of it. Unfortunately after about 5 great uses, I brought it back out to keep my food fresh during quarantine of COVID19 and it no longer has a suction. Me, my husband, and my son all tried to figure it out and the suction went out on me during this pandemic. Very disappointed to only get just a handful of uses out of it. May have to invest in another one....
customer_reviews.author: Denise pallitta

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but it just doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit. The first unit was returned to Amazon and replaced. Unfortunately, both units had the same problems. First, it’s really hard to get the latches to lock into place. You have to bear down with great force, which gets irritating if you’re sealing a large batch of items. Second, it often sucks away endlessly but never seems to be able to finish the job. The placement of the bag in the chamber is extremely fiddly - if you’re off by a hair, it won’t seal. It’s better than no vacuum sealer at all... but I wouldn’t buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: It works until is doesn't
customer_reviews.text: The motor still actually works, but there's a foam they use as the seal for the vacuum chamber and I guess that can go off pretty quickly - I was about 1/4 of the way through a wild boar when the bags stopped sealing. It would suck and suck and suck but no air would get pulled out of the bag because it was leaking through from the room. I checked the compressor tubes and everything but it's just a bad design. Maybe something like a rubber or latex foam would hold up to every day use instead of just occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Z.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: I had a vacuum sealer that worked well but it was much too big to store so I purchased another one that was smaller but the suction did not work well. So far (several months) this vacuum sealer has worked very well and does not have the problems of the other sealers. It is streamlined so it stores easily and the suction is better than on the smaller sealer I purchased. Sometimes the suction isn't as great as other times but if I fool with it I can get it to seal. I would definitely recommend this sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: just used this vacuum seal for the first time and it works great! We like the fact that it is light weight and easy to operate, got tired of trying to hit just the right spot with the foodsaver and once that broke after only 2 yrs we decided to try this one and viola! it works even better and is easy to place the bag for vacuum seal. Really great product. Now lets see if it will last longer than a 200 dollar foodsaver?!
customer_reviews.author: V. Albarez

customer_reviews.title: Compact and effective
customer_reviews.text: Just received this unit and prep'd some steaks I had. Seems to be a compact and effective product. The instructions are not great but it's all pretty intuitive. The only thing I would add is to make sure the unit is locked to bot seal and vac seal. On the first bag I tried it didn't seal completely and wouldn't vac. A good seal will create a solid clear seal line. Vac sealed some steaks no problem. Time will tell how durable it is but I'm happy for now.
customer_reviews.author: T. Costelloe

customer_reviews.title: Works really well... once you figure it out
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing I have used it once. The device was packaged well and looks great! Once open and unpacked it was a bit confusing to figure out how to use it. I watched a youtube video and was able to follow along from the reviewers steps. I do with the brand put together a quick how to use video (the youtube videos weren't great and too long). Once I figured out what needed to be done we were cooking. I used this to sous vide lamb chops and it held the seal well. I did double seal both ends just in case and had no issue. Hope to use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: ZNZ

customer_reviews.title: Lost suction after 1 meal prep
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for all of two weeks. Used for a food prep. Made sure to wait a period NO LESS THAN five minutes before each suck&seal. Prepared 8 meals this way. Everything held up/is holding up great in the freezer. Two weeks later tried to do another meal prep, only the suction would not work fully. Tried every kind of food over the course of to days, would not completely suction anything. If not because I waited too long to use this thing to learn it was defective it would be going back ASAP. Hopefully I just got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vacuum Sealer By NutriChef | Automatic Vacuum Air Sealing System For Food Preservation w/ Starter Kit | Compact Design | Lab Tested | Dry & Moist Food Modes | Led Indicator Lights (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver| Style Name:Vacuum SealerHow Vacuum Preserves Your Food
Vacuum sealing preserves food by blocking the growth of mold, fungus and bacteria that are responsible for ruining the food taste, appearance and texture.
Storage And Organization
Why have big lumps of uneven frozen blocks or half-full food containers that take up a lot of freezer space, when you can neatly stack airtight bags on top of each other?
Ideal for Dieting Or Baby Food
Prepare your meals, seal them and freeze them. Ideal for baby food preparation too, especially for working parents with limited time.
Easy To Clean
Lightweight and compact, this vacuum sealing system can be placed on any counter top. Its stain resistant housing will not absorb accidental spills, and it is easy to wipe it clean.
Suitable For Lots Of Other Uses Too!
Use it to reseal wine, oil and vinegar too. Once the seal is broken, shelf life of most liquids dramatically drops. Using the wine stopper cork included in our starter kit, you can reseal half-full bottles of wine, which if remain unsealed, would probably lose their spirit and end up in the trash can.
What’s in the Box:

Vacuum Sealer Wine Stopper Cork Air Suction Hose (5) Medium Vacuum Bags 7.8’’ x 11.8’’(1) Extra Long Vacuum Bag Roll 7.8’’ x 79.0’’
Technical Specs:
High-Power Suction Element: 110 Watt Vacuum/Suction Strength: 12L/minSealable Bags: Environment Friendly PolyamideWithstands Food Temperature of 212 ℉ Max Construction Material: Engineered ABS Power Cord Length: 3.3’ ft Power: 120V Dimensions (L x W x H): 14.1’’ x 6.0’’ x 3.0’’ Sold as: 1 Weight: 2.93lbs
Enjoy The NutriChef Versatility And Convenience – Just Click Add To Cart
feature_bullets: THE IDEAL MONEY AND TIME SAVING SOLUTION: Cooking and meal preparation will become easier, less expensive and faster, as you will be able to equip and organize your freezer, with fresh food ready to be defrosted and served or fresh ingredients instead of freezer burned food filled with ice crystals which will probably end up in the trash can

EASY TO OPERATE: Fully automatic simple electric plug in design with the control center placed on the top panel and soft touch digital buttons along with led indicator lights A smart device at your family’s service

TWO SEALING MODES: Useful and practical, the NutriChef vacuum sealing system is cleverly designed owning two selectable modes to provide your food with the best possible preservation based on the type of food you want to seal You can choose the dry indication for solid food items and the moist indication for poached, simmered or steamed food

LAB TESTED QUALITY: Vacuum sealers preserve food up to 5 times longer than zipper baggies or containers, basically depending on the type of food The NutriChef Vacuum Sealer however, was subjected to specific laboratory testing to effectively increase food shelf life

A FULL STARTER KIT: Apart from the vacuum sealer and the air suction hose, the Nutri Chef vacuum sealer package also includes a wine stopper cork, 5 medium vacuum bags (78 x 118 inch ) and one extra long vacuum bag roll (78 x 790 inch ), both kinds being reusable and waterproof A complete bundle for your new cooking era

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars12,568 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
